short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Superpowers for founders and sales teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension superpowers your prospecting productivity.

You can easily:
- Save your leads from LinkedIn
- Find their professional emails
- Generate personalized icebreakers
